review: I recently bought the fire tv stick as a late Christmas present for my dad (and, let's be real here, also for myself). It's exactly what I hoped it would be and even better. My dad is, to put it nicely, not the most tech savvy person in the world, and he LOVES it and has had absolutely no problems getting the hang of this device. The interface is so sleek and user-friendly, even for an Amazon product, and I was honestly surprised by how nice it was. We use it mainly for watching Netflix but it's super simple to use Amazon Prime and the other applications like Pandora and Hulu as well. The games are a nice touch too but I haven't really spent a lot of time using those because I only got the standard remote, which is a bit of a pain with the games. I'm sure they'd be great with the game controller, though. All in all this was such a great value, so simple to use and set up and it's perfect for streaming, and I even plan on getting a few others for upcoming family birthdays because it beats the hell out of a gift card any day.
